channel.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE
channel.description:
I have recently been downloading alot of different servers, in an attempt to regain some old runescape memories, but I haven't been capable of starting any of thoose servers. When I was younger, I was capable of setting up servers real quick, but now, it won't work. YES - I updated my java. YES - I got the latest JDK. YES - I have tried different run.bat codes, correcting the path's aswell. So really, I can't figure out what the issue is. All help would be appreciated. Here's the run.bat code, btw.
@echo off cd Bin java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause
And the issue.
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Thanks in advance! :)

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You are supposed to fix all that. make it work with your client,

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE
item.dc:creator: @Neximus Neximus
item.description:
@Neximus wrote:

Okay so copy&pasting it, I ended up with this.

The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .

So I am not supposed to fix the path to my correct JDK and stuff?

Though it’s a 317 server & client i’m using.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You get that error because you don’t have a main class declared, try

@echo off Title Rune-MTP cd ./bin/ "C:\Java2\bin\java.exe" client 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit
if it doesn’t work, post your error here, instead of just asking for a new one, because all clients are different.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE
item.dc:creator: @Neximus Neximus
item.description:
@Neximus wrote:

I did, still I have negative results.
I tried another run.bat code for the client, still having issue finding the main class.

@echo off color 0a title test "C:\Program Files (x86)\java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

Anyone got another run.bat code?
I’d be happy to test them

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE

item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

right click on computer, go to properties, advanced system settings, and set environmental variables.

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE

item.description:
@Neximus wrote:

I just saw somewhere that you had to fix your Environment Variables? Tho i’m not sure how…

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Okay, so it’s either looking for a file which isn’t there, or it’s looking in the wrong place. Make sure you have Java installed, and that all of the paths to it are all correct.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE
item.dc:creator: @Neximus Neximus
item.description:
@Neximus wrote:

I still assume that the codes shouldn’t be that different.

@echo off Title YourClient name here cd Client Start JAVAW -Xmx400m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit

What’s wrong here?
“Windows cannot find ‘JAVAW’…” something.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Ah, okay well I can’t help because I don’t know anything about windows 7… I’m a XP noob.

Edit: But now since your having trouble with your client, you should just ask for help in the client help section.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“Neximus, post:4, topic:417458”]@Eminem Beast
Oh, my fault. I am not sure, but I use the Thrillscape client & source.

@tyb97
Caused this error,

[quote]The system cannot find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

[quote]EDIT.
ACTUALLY -
I made a few minior changes, causing it to actually work!
@echo off
cd Bin
“C:\Program Files (x86)\java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause[/quote][/quote]
Okay well it’s Delta, but it would help if you told me what operating system you were using.

Good work.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Runserver.bat won't work. COMMON ISSUE
item.dc:creator: @Neximus Neximus
item.description:
@Neximus wrote:

@Eminem Beast
Oh, my fault. I am not sure, but I use the Thrillscape client & source.

@tyb97
Caused this error,

The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .

EDIT.
ACTUALLY -
I made a few minior changes, causing it to actually work!

@echo off cd Bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

But the client aren’t working.

@echo off Title YourClient name here cd Client Start JAVAW -Xmx400m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit

Read full topic
